title: 如何在屏幕上显示文字
author: lonely_L
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: TimmyOVO
replies.txt_content:
Player p =Bukkit.getPlayer("名字")
p.sendTitle(String title,String subtitle)

replies.author: RE_OVO
replies.txt_content:
用spigot的函数即可
首先你需要一个Player对象
例如: Player p=Bukkit.getServer().getPlayer("ID");
获取到player对象以后可以p.senTitle("主标题","子标题")；来发送title
需要spigot
